It's not really worth seeding, no offense to the uploader, but downloading them separate is much easier and better.  Download game one and while the first expansion is downloading you could be playing the game and get familiar with everything.  Once the first is done, start downloading the second and play with the content of the first expansion.

The store just takes about an hour, so you could download that and install it any time.  40 gigs with just a few seeders is just not worth it, separate is better.
